item.description:
Join us as check out the next restaurant in our North End dinner series- Antico Forno restaurant. This restaurant got very good reviews on Yelp and has a wide variety of menu items at reasonable prices. We will be enjoying dinner, then heading to a location nearby for drinks. Each member pays for their own food/drink.

 

RSVP Note. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend as this will be a popular event. If your plans change, please be sure to update your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. If you have trouble finding us call, 774 232 0000.
item.why: Dinner, drinks and good company in the North End on a Friday night- join us!
item.name: North End Dinner Series: Antico Forno
